entry.title: News: Received Best RA-L Paper Award at BioRob 2022 in Seoul

link.title: News: Received Best RA-L Paper Award at BioRob 2022 in Seoul

entry.content: I had a great time attending BioRob 2022 in Seoul, Korea and presenting our paper “Predicting Sagittal-Plane Swing Hip Kinematics in Response to Trips” for lead author Shannon M. Danforth. I was honored to accept the Best RA-L Paper Award on behalf of our team. Thanks to Hyeju Yoo for the pictures!
entry.summary: For our paper ''Predicting Sagittal-Plane Swing Hip Kinematics in Response to Trips''.

entry.title: News: Started job as Senior Engineer in Research at the University of Michigan

link.title: News: Started job as Senior Engineer in Research at the University of Michigan

entry.content: I’m excited to continue my research on safe motion planning at ROAHM Lab and the Ford Center for Autonomous Vehicles. Can’t wait to work next to such talented people (as well as my robotic coworkers of course):
entry.summary: I started my first post-graduate position.

entry.title: News: PhD Defense
entry.content:
I successfully defended my Dissertation ‘‘Towards Safe Autonomy in Assistive Robots’’ on August 3rd, 2021. Thank you so much to everyone that attended, and to my committee members for their thoughtful help and insight!

For the interested reader, you can find my dissertation here.
entry.summary: I successfully defended my Dissertation ''Towards Safe Autonomy in Assistive Robots''.
